1.content:
Okay, before we would begin, we would like to ask you to choose your route and it will only take two chapters before the stories will be begin from your choosing. Please, feel free to add a chapter anywhere you want, but no ending and choices from chapter 3 please, if you could

Anyway, who would you like to choose to get affected by weight gain and growth?
1.title: Beginning

11.content: You chose Leondre! Okay, now which of the three should he get affected by? Remember, the story starts when after you select from this chapter here!
11.title: Leondre

choices: ...start eating junk food while at it.
...head to some food challenges he could try.
111.content:
It begins with Leondre Devries who got home from Soccer Six yesterday and he was still feeling tired from that running legs on the turf when he was struggling to get up early in the morning. It was 10am that morning and Leondre was slowly getting himself up and made a big yawn for a stretch before his stomach have started to growl in hunger and he looks as if though he may need some now.

"Man, I've never had something to eat since coming home from Soccer Six. I should do something to calm me down for a bit." Leondre thought as he walks out of his bedroom in his pjs and heads downstairs to have some breakfast to start of the day.

He had some cereal and some pancakes for his meal before he sits on the sofa at the living room and look over his phone to keep up to date for his beloved Bambinos alike and have a chat from his best friend, Charlie! 10 minutes later, Leondre finished the breakfast he consumed while he can, but his stomach gives another growl and he had no idea why he was still hungry, despite he had some breakfast just few minutes ago?

So he thought he needed some help and asks the Bambinos through phone to think what should he do to get himself full? After few minutes of browsing through some answers, he found one he particularly thinks it's a good idea to have a go. That's when he thought when he decides to...
111.title: Feeling hungry in the morning

1111.content:
"Mmm, maybe eating junk food is the best I could have really?" Leondre thought and thanked the Bambinos through social media for their ideas and advices in such before he would get up and go to the kitchen to get some food from there.

He looked around to see some light snacks on one cabinet, but he's also good at cooking, so maybe he can cook something up some dinner, no matter how much amount he would take from proportions in such. He later finished his cooking procedure when he had some plates to place before he sits on the chair to start consuming as he could go. Despite he was struggling for a bit, he managed to finished off the the food he needed and a burp is what he needed for before he gets up to his feet and plops himself down on the sofa to watch some TV.

"Man, that was fine eaten. But I need someone to help me and I know how?" Leondre wondered as he would think he'll be hungry again. So he took out a phone and texts his friend, Charlie to come over tomorrow to which he agreed to. But in the meanwhile, he'll have time to rub on his bloated belly and enjoy watching some TV for a while.
1111.title: Eating junk food wouldn't be that bad, can it?

choices: Leondre gives into his new hunger
11112.content:
Leondre got up the following morning hungry for some food. He got up and cooked up some things. He went into his kitchen and prepped it. When Leondre finished his feast, he realized that he had made a bit more than he planned. So he decided to eat it before it goes bad.

“I guess if I’m this big from yesterday, better see how far I could get.” Leondre thought.

He dug in and made sure he ate it all. Little did the musician know it could affect his musical career but he didn’t care. When he finished his food, Leondre had stuffed himself beyond he ever thought he could get. He cleaned up the kitchen and settled into the couch. Rubbing his bloated belly, he noticed it was a bit bigger than it was last night. He guessed it was just from all he ate.

“Ok, yesterday was fine eating but now this is gut busting big.” Leondre said.

He turned his TV on and tried to watch it but he fell asleep in the couch from all the food he just ate. While he slept, Leondre dreamt that he was eating all the time and being force fed by Charlie whenever he stops eating. Every time he gets a good look at himself in his dream, he is twice as big as he was from the last time he checked. He was soon woken up by Charlie shaking him. He was in shock at how much his friend just ate and told him to stop.
11112.title: Tomorrow.

111121.content:
Although Charlie tried to convince his friend to stop, Leondre however didn't have his thoughts and still kept on eating, since through his mind, his habits have started to change dramatically. Of course since he was trying to do it for the fans, it made himself to try and feed himself more food. But he's still didn't know the consequences when it comes to his weight, that is despite he had a dream of himself being twice as big than his original size.

At this stage though, Leondre had just finished his massive meal, and soon let's it out with a massive belch for good measure, before he placed his hands on his bloated belly and rubs it to calm it down again.

"Ah, That was too good!" Leondre says in a more calm was as possible, even when his friend Charlie was sitting across the room, looking concerned about Leondre's new habits. Charlie would think Leondre may be done for the day, but soon, a 13 year old spoke out again. "Say, how about if we could go out and get somewhere to eat?"

"Wha... are you kidding me?" Charlie looked shocked, even despite Leondre looked full and bloated, yet he was still hungry at this stage. "Leondre, you've been eating like this a whole day. Why can't you take it easy for a while?" That's when Charlie was trying to help Leondre to take it easy for a bit.

"I know, but I just thought I wanna have some more food, since I couldn't help but think about it." That was Leondre's excuse, since he'd never had been some hungry than usual in his entire life. But is he letting loose, marks the question from Charlie's concern. But he sighed and gives it for his friend's benefit.

"Alright fine, we'll go and get somewhere to eat." Charlie stood up, and even helping Leondre getting up to his feet, before he would take him somewhere to eat. "So, where would you like to go?" He asked.

"Hmm..." Leondre had a lot to think, but it didn't take long when he had his say on that. "Maybe we could head up to...
111121.title: Leondre gives into his new hunger

choices: "Nah, I'll keep on eating whatever I want."
111122.content:
It may have been a dream he thought of himself looking twice as big than he was, but it was almost exactly happened week later when he looked over to the mirror once again, but with his underwear briefs he wanted to check it out for himself.

"Whoa, did this happen to me when I ate so much for a week?" Leondre thought of himself.

Indeed, he knew why his belly was rather pudgier than he was flat slim about over a week again since the suggestion had been made. His belly looked fat and jiggled, he could rub or pat with it. His hips have gone a bit wider as well and his butt looked fat when he turned around to have a look through the mirror and touched it as well.

He did have form a double chin a bit and the rest looked thick just as he was turning into some flab from eating. He had been doing this non-stop and just couldn't take a break to get some more or even head out to some restaurants nearby. The trouble was at the start was his concert tour with Charlie was not that long to go too.

"I don't know, should I be worried about my weight when I got this gig coming up?" Leondre thought of himself with a long hard question, but he replied with a shrugged and says once more.
111122.title: A week later

choices: Go to sumo school and help to gain there.
Stay at home and starts fetching some food.
Get help from Charlie to feed him.
1112.content:
It took some thoughts for Leondre to think what he eat to fill himself in, but soon he had a look on the TV and saw there was a sumo school which is not far from where he lives. That's when he had a thought of trying to eat, but also might have to be big to be a sumo wrestler by chance.

"Yeah, maybe sumo wrestling sounds fun. I might need to get fatter and start eating though." Leondre thought through his head in straight.

Although it is a risk he had to make, but he had to make sure and let both the bambinos and his friend, Charlie know about his idea and go with it. It may take some months or so to get to this stage, but Leondre has plenty of time to feed as long as he gets hungry and fill it in as much as possible.

Moments after he informed them all by social media, Leondre begins his journey to be a sumo wrestler and gain much weight as he can. But how does he start in way?
1112.title: Take up sumo

choices: ...at the food court from the mall?"
11123.content:
Leondre had to wonder how should he start doing sumo, if he's not yet bigger than potential 500lbs as it seems to be his target at the moment. But soon he had an idea.

"I know, maybe I could phone Charlie and he could help make me a sumo wrestler, if he could feed me loads of food?" That was Leondre's suggestion.

Charlie by the way, is Leondre's best friend, although they've met through the internet some months before that. Although it seems to be an ideal for this, but it's just that Leondre doesn't gorge himself on his own, which whatever happens, he could either get his friend, or his fans to help him get fatter while he could. So, he went over to his phone decides to give Charlie a call to think about this.

"Hello?" Charlie answered the phone which his Leondre could hear it from.

"Yo Charlie, It's Leo! I got something which is kinda urgent at the moment." Leondre replied and wanted to knew his friend know the situation right away.

"Okay, sure! What do you need?" Charlie asked to wonder.

"Well, I've recently asked the fans what should I do, and I saw they have a sumo wrestling school around here. But I need to gain as much as possible and would like you to help me feed me stuff to get me fatter?" Leondre explains the situation.

"Umm... sure! Are you sure you're gonna do this? Charlie gradually accepts, but felt concern as if that's what Leondre wanted to gain in some a massive he had to be a sumo wrestler it seems.

"Yeah! I'll be fine, so don't worry about me." Leondre replied before he gives him more details of things. "So, how about if you could meet me at...
11123.title: Make A Phone Call

choices: ...get something to eat to practice on his own.
1113.content:
Leondre had some thoughts through his head in some time as there were so many things he can do while bring a star alongside with his friend, Charlie. Soon though, that brought him some idea and would think this could be interesting to give it a try.

"Hmmm.... maybe food challenges sounds fun to have. I always wanted to compete and eat loads of food among the way."

Leondre smiled in suggestion with this decision to try it out, but if he wants to do it for the bambinos, I'm sure they don't mind let him have his time to make it happens. So he let's the fans knows by phone on what's happening and soon, it was time to start planning on simple challenges, like small one if he wants and build it up from there, but if Leondre could do huge challenges as early as of either Today or Tomorrow, that would be interesting to see how he goes from there.

"I know I wanted it so bad, but I wanna see how I can handle with food in front of me, I mean, what else could go wrong?" Leondre thought and shrugged with a smile otherwise.

But the adventures would soon begin and he needed Charlie to help him along the way and the fans too to follow his lead too. So with that, he decides to...
1113.title: Food challenges

11132.content:
Although he would have to try and keep his promise for his fans, Leondre suggests that he didn't want any time being wasted, and so it was his decision that he wanted to start his first challenge straight away. Despite he'd never tried anything like this before, it's whether or not if he could handle some much pressure, where it could be tons of food being presented to him or some other challenges he's competing with, but he didn't mind either those.

"Hmm... maybe I should take a look and see what kind of challenges do they have on the table?" Leondre wondered, and as soon as he thinks with that, he stands up and heads out of the house, before making his way to the place for some food challenges.

In fact, he was heading there by his phone, which he searches the nearest area of the town where he lives, and hopefully there's some of these are open to anybody in particular. Luckily, he found a spot on the map, and soon-afterwards, he walked up to the place and gets in.

"This is the place I'm looking for?" Leondre says in his thought, but the question we had to ask, is what is Leondre challenging for?
11132.title: Head Straight To The Challenge

112.content:
It was on this Summer when Leondre was in paradise and takes some lay back at his backyard for some sunbathe from his gig with Charlie. It was much tiring to say the least, but a well earned rest was certainly a good idea and kicking back in style.

While he was having a sunbathe on the grass, there was so small looking saucer, flying around the backyard from out of nowhere and no wonder where it that came from in certain. It spotted Leondre laying down it which he looked like a giant sized to them. But it wasn't got let this 13 year old boy go, however as it takes a close look at him and examine every movement it gets before decided what to do on him.

It takes some moments before it comes to a conclusion by zapping the beam right at Leondre, before the saucer takes its immediate exit. Still sunbathing at this point, it only took some seconds before he looked getting taller with an impact. He didn't feel what was going on and he continued on growing right until he stopped at what height?
112.title: A Well Earned Break

113.content:
It was much a quiet day for Leondre, as he was getting up from his sleep and knowing that he was on his own for a while. He had been quite busy for some days with his engagement he had to go through with the fans, but he knew these days like this would calm things down for a bit and get on with things.

He wanted to try and start breakfast when he came downstairs. But then, Leondre can hear some like it came through the door and dropped it to the ground. He can only looked towards it and see there's a parcel with his name on it. That's when he knew it was another fan mail once more he receive now and then.

"Another fan mail?" Leondre wondered, but shrugged for a moment before he continued on saying, "Oh well, I guess I gotta find out what's inside."

So, Leondre did what he suggested at this point and grabbed the parcel before he comes over and sits on the couch to open it up to see what's inside. It took some while to open it, but once he did, he brought it out and saw it was only just a...
113.title: A Surprise Fan Mail

1131.content:
Leondre may have receiving a fan mail surprises since he and his friend, Charlie’s stardom to fame, but this is by far the strangest gift he’s ever seen. When it opened the package, he was a lot of confused to see it was only a bottle with liquid still in full.

“Huh... Why would someone decide to give a bottle to me?” Leondre can only wonder in confusion, but he would shrugged regardless when continued on in response. “But I guess I can be appreciative in times, so I could give it try and see what it tastes.”

The bottle clearly looked like some soda, which made Leondre wonder if it would tastes the same as the rest? But even when he was sceptical about the gift given by a fan, he thinks he need to do this, and that he would take another look at the bottle again, before taking deep breath, as if there’s no time to waste.

“Alright, here goes nothing!” Leondre says in a concern look to his face. He takes off the top of cap and decides to..
1131.title: A bottle gifted by a fan?

choices: ...try and get myself out of my house."
1132.content:
Curious just to see what kinda of fan mail Leondre gets, he would often get some good one, but also weird ones as well sine he's now famous alongside his friend, Charlie. That might be another case in mind, when Leondre opened up and saw this strange looking object that looked like a remote controller, but with different buttons he's never seen before, but not before he looked at the label that it had said what it is.

"A Size Device? Hmmm.... that's pretty strange, but rather curious to say the least. Maybe I should try it out and see what it's like?" Leondre thought of his suggestion.

Of course, he wanted to try it out a little bit, which he knows that it may be just a prop with nothing else to work. So he shrugged and gives this a go and sets up the device it had asked Leondre to do. Once he did that, he stood up and takes a deep breath before he aimed at himself and shoots it with a laser struck him. That jumped when whatever that laser took, this could be the moment he would knew that this remote had done something to him.

It happened moments later, when first of all, he felt his belly was starting to push out from him, then so did the rest of his body, and from that on, he was started to get taller too, making Leondre absolute shocked from this and couldn't believe that he was actually getting bigger for real,

His body was swelling very well, which his butt and thighs are about to get the biggest part of his body. His belly was so fat and larger, even when it overlapped his meaty thighs, his arms are thicken and legs are thickened and his face was turning chunky with some chins developing. As for his height, Leondre grew all the way, when he first bumped his head on the ceiling. Must to this pain, he decides to take a seat on the floor in hoping that this should never happen again.

But it didn't, and kept growing when his head had bumped again, and that's when the growth finally came to a stop, which Leondre's head had touched the ceiling whilst sitting on the floor, and he looks so obese, he weighs at 500lbs (if he was normal height), and his ginormous butt and thighs are have taken up mostly on the floor. Leondre couldn't believe it, even with his expression that he then started to smile and giggle that it all happened to him by surprise, all because of that fan mail and a remote it did to him.

"Wow, I'm so big and fat! This is the greatest feeling of my life. Maybe I should...
1132.title: Give This A Try

12.content: You chose Charlie! Okay, now which of the three should he get affected by? Remember, the story starts when after you select from this chapter here!
12.title: Charlie

13.content: You chose both Leondre and Charlie! Okay, now which of the three should he get affected by? Remember, the story starts when after you select from this chapter here!
13.title: Both Leondre and Charlie

info.brief_description: Whatever happens, Both Leondre and Charlie are about to get bigger in different ways.
info.description:
For those who do not know, Bars and Melody (B.A.M) are a British singing/rapping duo consisting of rapper Leondre Devries ("Bars") and singer Charlie Lenehan ("Melody"). They met in September 2013 via Facebook, after Lenehan had seen many of Devries' covers as a solo rapper. Lenehan said to Devries, "Do you want to meet up?" in January 2014, so, accompanied by their parents, they met in late January and decided to form a music duo, naming themselves Bars and Melody (or B.A.M, as stated in their first appearance). On 8 February 2014, Bars and Melody auditioned in Manchester for the eighth series of Britain's Got Talent. They performed a song based on Twista and Faith Evans' "Hope", with Devries replacing the original verses with ones protesting against bullying. After the audition, the audience began chanting "Push the gold!". Bars & Melody received the golden buzzer from Simon Cowell and went straight through to the live semi-finals. Their audition has been viewed on YouTube more than 50 million times. (Source, Wikipedia)

I might take too long so you'll find more about the two through web searches you can find. This is a weight gain and growth (giant) story which can either be separate scenario or combine as one and the choices you'll find from the start. The rules however are as follows:

*There is no sex or toilet stuff so keep it clean, please.
*No nudity!
*No age changing please so I like it that way. (I know it may be past but I want their age they first appeared through BGT; Leondre 13, and Charlie 15.)
*No short chapters as I want at least a paragraph.
*Also, be realistic through scenarios as well.
*Both two characters cannot die in this story and I don't want to end this story.

Please note that anyone breaks the rules that it says from there, will be deleted and informed from me! So be careful for that.

That's all I got but please add while you can and hope I'll see you soon!

UPDATE 5/10/19: I'm also interested in roleplay, if you want to have a go? If so, either let me know either here or on Discord pjc-fc#4186 and I’ll see what we can come up for this.
info.pretty_title: Bars and Melody: Giant and Weight Gain
